meta.job_title: Cell and Viral Therapy Research Scientist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support process and product development activities for cell and viral therapy.
Perform analytical assays for cellular health and biophysical characterization.
Design and implement experiments in formulation screening, cryopreservation, and fill-finish.
Make detailed observations, analyze data, interpret results, and prepare technical reports.
Present findings at internal meetings and contribute to the preparation of manuscripts and patent applications.
Function effectively as a member of project teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Chemistry, Biochemistry, Pharmaceutics, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering or related field
